NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
THATCH: My friends, you've arrived at last! Shall we begin our expedition to the Quantum Moon soon?
2
1
MELORAE: My apologies, my dear nephew - but we were not aware of this second Quantum Moon Locator on Brittle Hollow! We had been expecting your arrival at the locator we had built on Ember Twin!
3
1
THATCH: Oh! Oh.. Oh dear. My deepest apologies for my mistake! I was not aware there was a Quantum Moon Locator on Ember Twin, either!
4 3
THATCH: But.. As our expedition team is already here, would it be possible to use the Quantum Moon Locator here for our expedition today?
5
4
COLEUS: I'm afraid that would not be wise, Thatch. This locator has a poor view of the sky; That will make observing the Quantum Moon quite difficult.
6
5
COLEUS: The plan was to leave a set of eyes at the Quantum Moon Locator to keep the Quantum Moon locked from afar, so that we would be able to carefully plan a shuttle trajectory to it.
7
4
BELLS: With its clear view of the sky, and ability to pinpoint each celestial body, we deemed the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> much more useful for using the rule of quantum imaging from afar.
8
7
SOLANUM: I see.. But Bells, what purpose does the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> here serve then?
9
8
BELLS: To allow me to know when you have safely reached your destination, my dear pupil.
10
9
BELLS: Now, it is time to depart for your pilgrimage at last, Solanum. Remember, Ilex is providing you a set of eyes on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin;</color> you musn't keep him waiting too long!
BH_QML EX1 6
BH_QML EX2 2
BH_QML EX3 6
BH_QML EX4 7
BH_QML R4 3
